name: Messy city cleaner truck parking
description:
Messy city cleaner truck parking

It's 2017, so get ready to sit behind the wheel of a truck! If you are a fan of driving and parking simulator games, then you cannot miss the latest driving and parking game ! In this fun new game.
There is different type of vehicles available like Bulldozer, Forklift, Mini truck, Crain, junkyard truck, etc.

Experience being a real trucker in this real truck simulator game. Keep the city roads clean.
Collect different check points and reach to the destination and if your truck will touch any scrap yard 3 times then your game is crashed.

The 3D junkyard truck will be easy to control because of the steering wheel and the pedals on the screen and also view camera option.
We challenge you to complete the 50 different levels of this free junkyard flying truck. if you can do this you can proudly call yourself a real Truck Driver and Flying man!

We hope you will enjoy this amazing City Cleaner Truck Parking game and give us some love by downloading this game.

Key features:

=> Truck driving physics are amazingly realistic
=> Easy to control truck, this makes it fun to play for all ages people
=> Amazing 3D game and 3D city road to drive in with your different truck
=> Multiple camera views
=> Clean your city with heavy transport truck
=> Real life driving and parking experience
